column4: ------ When I plug in some devices via USB nothing happens... is this normal? I thought it would at least say IDK what that is or something. Part 2: How do I find drivers for usb stuff?
it should indeed auto mount for you
it would be considered a composite device
it connects via usb, but it will actually be doing IP over usb
yeah I connected both a logitech webcam, and this other usb device and got no notification from ubuntu 10.04 that anything had been connected
mm  well the web cam wont show up without webcam software like  comorama  or cheese
ok, if the webcam won't show up than the other device definitively wouldn't

do you know of anyway that might work to start a script @boot with root access when the script fails with crontab, rc.local, and linking it to init.d (it runs but segfaults when it gets to a program) but runs fine when I wait until ubuntu boots and run it in the terminal? I have also tried to manually set the $PATH and $TERM in the script without sucess.
the person here I would trust with script is soreau ,,:)
log off,,, clcik to enter your password,,,  just below on the panel is the sessions menu ,, c hoose from there then put in password and hit en ter
schnuffle ... how do I install ubuntu-desktop in lxde?
open a terminal     sudo apt-get install ubunt-desktop
schnuffle it doesn't appear that this system has apt-get... is that possible?
yes... it actually worked... it just didn't tab complete which made me think it wasn't installed
